column4: Win7 is recognized as Vista Loader, don't know about Vista though
well this is a vista install. I did delete all the pointless dell recovery partitions though
can only speak for Win7, it creates a partition called system reserved and in that appearently the bootloader resides, maybe you deletet that, think Vista uses the same bootloader
you could boot from the vista disc and let it restore mbr, but you will ahve to reinstall grub after that as well
